price: (27) [Solomon] said, "We will see whether you were truthful or were of the liars.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
